GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1964, integrating all the country's facilities for further and higher education.
AdmissionRequirements: Malawi School Certificate of Education or equivalent

Address.college_name: Lilongwe University of Agriculture and Natural Resources

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1964 as Bunda College of Agriculture (a former constituent college of the University of Malawi). Acquired present status from the merging of Bunda College of Agriculture (Bunda), Natural Resources College (NRC) and Agricultural Research and Extension Trust (ARET), 2012.

Divisions.College: MACOHA and Sogecoa Golden Peacock Satellite Campuses

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 2000 as Malawi Adventist College. Affiliated as a Junior College to the University of Eastern Africa, Baraton (Kenya) 2007 before acquiring affiliated University status.
Founded 1980. A professional training institution and statutory body (Government owned organization)

Address.college_name: Malawi University of Science and Technology

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 2012 and  opened to students in 2014

Ndata School of Climate and Earth Sciences

AdmissionRequirements: Malawi Certificate of Education or equivalent

GeneralInformation.History: Founded as University in Blantyre 1994. Acquired current status and title 2007.
Formerly known as Skyway Business College, acquired current status and title 2012.

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1875 as Livingstonia Mission. Started offering Higher Education programmes 1895, acquired present title 2003.
AdmissionRequirements: ) or equivalent, with an aggregate of not more than 36 points in the best 6 subjects
Applicants must have a credit in English; Admission tests and interview

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1964. Relocated from Blantyre to Zomba 1973. A constituent college of the University of Malawi.

Address.college_name: University of Malawi – College of Medicine

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1991. A constituent college of University of Malawi (UNIMA).
AdmissionRequirements: 'A' level passes in Biology, Chemistry, Mathematics or Physics

Address.college_name: University of Malawi – Kamuzu College of Nursing

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1979. A constituent college of University of Malawi (UNiMA).

Address.college_name: University of Malawi – The Malawi Polytechnic

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1964. A constituent college of University of Malawi.
